text: Fort Ticonderoga (), formerly Fort Carillon, is a large 18th-century star fort. It is in New York State. File:Fort Ticonderoga barracks, canon.JPG|Officers' barracks, right; soldiers' barracks, left File:Fort Ticonderoga, inside the first wall.jpg|Inside the first wall; officers' barracks at left, soldiers' barracks at right File:Fort Ticonderoga, store room and powder magazine.jpg|Store room and powder magazine; soldiers' barracks at right File:Forttic1.jpg|Front of the fort File:Forttic2.jpg|View of the lake from the front File:Forttic3.jpg|Back view of the fort ==References== Category:Buildings and structures in New York (state) Category:National Register of Historic Places Ticonderoga Category:1750s establishments in the Thirteen Colonies Category:18th-century establishments in New York (state)
title: Fort Ticonderoga
